input_text.Prompt: Can you tell me how to begin a home sewing business?
input_text.Response A: Sure, I can try.  It’s a good idea to figure out what you want to sell, and what you want to make.  You might want to check out your local craft stores, and see if there are any opportunities you can take advantage of.  If you’re looking to start a home sewing business, you might want to check out if there are any local sewing groups you can join, and see if there are any opportunities there for you to make money.
input_text.Response B: Sure!  First, you’ll need to create a sewing pattern.  You can do this by drawing your design on paper, or using computer-aided design (CAD) software.  Then you’ll need to make a prototype of your design, so you can test it and make sure it works correctly.  Next, you’ll need to create a production version of your design, and make a few samples to show potential customers.  Finally, you’ll need to set up a website and marketing materials to promote your business.  Good luck!

label_annotations.factors_a: There were plausible ideas involved but a step by step guide with a variety of ideas would have been more ideal
label_annotations.factors_b: There were some good ideas, but it just lacked a bit of structure and idea planning
label_annotations.feedback: Both responses had some good ideas, but I feel like I would have wanted some more information to make me feel more confident on starting my own sewing business
